control.name: Implement two or more independent functionalities to detect the app is running inside an emulator.
control.desc: Implement two or more independent functionalities to detect when the app is running inside an emulator in the context of the overall protection scheme. With this security protection in place, the app forces the adversary to invest significantly more manual effort to run the app within an emulator.

reference.name: OWASP MASVS - Android - Testing Advanced Anti-Emulation
OWASP MASVS - iOS - Testing Advanced Anti-Emulation

test.steps: Check if there exists two or more functionalities to detect the app is running inside an emulator.
